title.value: Clinical Implementation of egs_brachy Graphical User Interface for LDR Brachytherapy
title.justification: The paper focuses on the clinical implementation and validation of the egs_brachy graphical user interface for LDR prostate and breast brachytherapy.
title.quote: Purpose: To clinically implement the egs_brachy graphical user interface (eb_gui) for low-dose-rate (LDR) prostate and breast brachytherapy...

extractions.description: This paper discusses the clinical implementation and validation of the egs_brachy graphical user interface for low-dose-rate prostate and breast brachytherapy. It includes a comparison of Monte Carlo simulations with treatment planning system calculations across test cases.

type.justification: The paper involves experimental validation and comparison of dose calculations using Monte Carlo simulations, indicating empirical research.
type.quote: Materials and Methods: A series of test cases for both breast and prostate was developed...

name.justification: The paper is focused on brachytherapy, which is a type of radiation therapy.
name.quote: Purpose: To clinically implement the egs_brachy graphical user interface (eb_gui) for low-dose-rate (LDR) prostate and breast brachytherapy...

name.justification: The paper discusses dose distribution evaluations and dosimetric accuracy.
name.quote: ...eg_gui address an important need for improved dosimetric accuracy in clinical LDR brachytherapy.

name.justification: The paper uses Monte Carlo simulations extensively for dose calculation and comparisons.
name.quote: Materials and Methods: For each case, two MC simulations were performed using eb_gui...

name.justification: The paper introduces and uses the egs_brachy graphical user interface for conducting simulations.
name.quote: Purpose: To clinically implement the egs_brachy graphical user interface (eb_gui) for low-dose-rate (LDR) prostate and breast brachytherapy...

is_contributed.justification: The paper contributes the eb_gui for clinical implementation, indicating a new development by the authors.
is_contributed.quote: Conclusions: A clinical implementation of the eb_gui workflow along with various test cases for LDR breast and prostate were developed.

is_executed.justification: The eb_gui was used to perform Monte Carlo simulations in the study.
is_executed.quote: Materials and Methods: For each case, two MC simulations were performed using eb_gui...

is_compared.justification: There is no indication that the eb_gui was compared to other existing graphical user interfaces.
is_compared.quote: ...good agreement was found for both breast and prostate cases.

referenced_paper_title.justification: No external referenced paper was mentioned for the egs_brachy GUI in the provided text.

name.justification: The paper refers to using the MIM Symphony for clinical TG43 dosimetry calculations.
name.quote: ...clinical TG43 dosimetry calculated in MIM Symphony (V6.9.5).

referenced_paper_title.justification: No specific paper referenced for the MIM Symphony; it is mentioned as a tool used in the study.

name.justification: While not directly used in the first paper, the Geant4 Toolkit is mentioned as part of related research work on a Monte Carlo treatment planning software.
name.quote: Monte Carlo treatment planning software based on the Geant4 toolkit v. 10.02.p02 was developed.

referenced_paper_title.value: DEVELOPMENT OF A NOVEL DOSIMETRY SOFTWARE FOR PATIENT-SPECIFIC INTRAVASCULAR BRACHYTHERAPY TREATMENT PLANNING ON OPTICAL COHERENCE TOMOGRAPHY IMAGES
referenced_paper_title.justification: The Geant4 Toolkit is discussed in the following paperâ€™s context, not directly in the scope of the first paper, but related as indicated in the conference segment.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Development of a novel dosimetry software... based on the Geant4 toolkit v. 10.02.p02...
